articles.title: Landing on the Moon
articles.description: Neil Armstrong recalls landing on the moon.
articles.body: 'Oh, the times we had!', Armstrong says with a smile.

articles.title: Where have you gone, Roger Maris?
articles.description: Roger Maris hit 61 home runs in 1961, a record that still stands.
articles.body: In 1961, Roger Maris hit 61 home runs - without the use(or availability) of steroids and performance enhancing drugs.
